projectInfo(1) General Commands Manual projectInfo(1)

NAME

projectInfo —
identify build tool for software development project

SYNOPSIS

projectInfo key [key ...] [-inDirectory path]

DESCRIPTION

This tool is used to identify the build tool, such as /usr/bin/xcodebuild or /usr/bin/gnumake, for a software development project. The use of this tool is discouraged.

Typical use of this tool is: projectInfo BUILDTOOL

11/1/04 Mac OS X
